title: Add/Drop Deadlines
text: Students may add courses through the end of week 1. Students may drop without transcript notation through the end of week 2.

title: Academic Standing
text: Undergraduate students must maintain a cumulative GPA of 2.0 or higher to remain in good standing.

title: Summer Credit Limits
text: Students may enroll in up to 9 credits during a standard summer term without special approval.

title: Attendance
text: Students are expected to attend all class sessions. Instructors may reduce grades for excessive unexcused absences.

title: Financial Aid Satisfactory Progress
text: To retain financial aid eligibility, students must complete at least 67% of attempted credits and meet GPA minimums.
